ideas.title: Flinders Street FOMO
ideas.premise: A crowd of stick figures is frantically running in circles at Flinders Street Station, captioned "Everyone's missing somethingâ€¦ probably"
ideas.why_funny: Playing on Melbourne's anxiety of always missing out on something great.

ideas.title: Hook Turn Confusion
ideas.premise: A tourist asks a local for hook turn directions, the local responds with an Escher-esque diagram of roads.
ideas.why_funny: Hook turns are notoriously confusing, even for Melburnians.

ideas.title: Coffee Snob Apocalypse
ideas.premise: Empty streets after a news headline: 'Flat White Shortage Declared!'
ideas.why_funny: Highlights Melbourne's obsession with good coffee and the panic it would cause.

ideas.title: Yarra River Mystery
ideas.premise: A scientist stares into the Yarra River, with a speech bubble saying, "I still can't explain the colour."
ideas.why_funny: The Yarra River's murky colour is an ongoing, unacknowledged joke.

ideas.title: Four Seasons in One Day...Again
ideas.premise: A weather forecast predicts sun, rain, hail, and snow, all with a shrug emoji.
ideas.why_funny: Melbourne's unpredictable weather is a constant source of amusement (and frustration).
